mapper.select: select * from coupon order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into coupon(name, type, value, min_amount, total_count, remaining_count, limit_per_user, validity_type, start_time, end_time, valid_days, applicable_products, applicable_categories, status) values (#{name}, #{type}, #{value}, #{minAmount}, #{totalCount}, #{remainingCount}, #{limitPerUser}, #{validityType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{validDays}, #{applicableProducts}, #{applicableCategories}, #{status})
mapper.update: update coupon set name = #{name}, type = #{type}, value = #{value}, min_amount = #{minAmount}, total_count = #{totalCount}, remaining_count = #{remainingCount}, limit_per_user = #{limitPerUser}, validity_type = #{validityType}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, valid_days = #{validDays}, applicable_products = #{applicableProducts}, applicable_categories = #{applicableCategories}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
